head.title: Writing an AD Value on a Output Stream

meta.name: description
meta.content: Writing an AD Value on a Output Stream

html.body:
This: section, frame
Description
Sends the Base value corresponding to the AD<Base> object x to the output stream os.
Example
The file Output.cpp
contains an example and a test of this operation. It returns true if it succeeds and false otherwise.
Input File: CppAD\local\Output.h
